sw_repo.description: The location from which to download installation images.

ifix_repo.description: The location from which to download ifixes.

fixpack_repo.description: The location from which to download fix packs.
fixpack_repo.displayname: Business Automation Workflow fix packs location

log_dir.description: The log directory for all log files that are generated during installation and configuration.
log_dir.displayname: Business Automation Workflow installation & configuration log directory

install_mode.description: In what mode you install Business Automation Workflow.

comment.description: A comment which you can add when you create the user identifier.
comment.displayname: Business Automation Workflow user comment for user

gid.description: The name of the operating system group that will be allocated to the product installation.
gid.displayname: Business Automation Workflow user group name

home.description: The home directory for the operating system user, to be used for product installation.
home.displayname: Business Automation Workflow installation userid home directory

name.description: The operating system user identifier that you use to install the product. This identifier is created if it does not exist.

shell.description: The default shell for the operating system user identifier.
shell.displayname: Business Automation Workflow userid default shell

version.description: The release and fix pack level of the Business Automation Workflow package you are installing. For example, 18001 for version 18.0.0.1.

install_dir.description: The installation root directory for Business Automation Workflow.
install_dir.displayname: Business Automation Workflow product installation directory

im_version.description: The Installation Manager version number that is included in Workflow installation images.

ifix_names.description: The ifix list in string format. For example "ifix1.zip, ifix2.zip, ifix3.zip"

fixpack_names_list.description: The fix pack list in string format. For example "cf1.tar.gz, cf2.tar.gz, cf3.tar.gz"

features.description: The Business Automation Workflow feature, for example 'WorkflowEnterprise.Production' or 'WorkflowEnterprise.NonProduction'.

offering_id.description: The product identifier of the Business Automation Workflow offering.

offering_version.description: The Business Automation Workflow offering version value.

profile_id.description: The profile information that will be injected into the response file and used to install Business Automation Workflow.

product_type.description: The product types: Express, Standard, Advanced, or AdvancedOnly.

deployment_type.description: The type of the deployment environment: PC or PS. Use 'PC' to create a Workflow Center deployment environment and 'PS' to create a Workflow Server deployment environment.
deployment_type.displayname: Business Automation Workflow deployment environment type

cluster_type.description: The type of cluster: SingleCluster or ThreeClusters(which will be supported later).

deadmin_alias_user.description: The user name of the deployment environment administrator.

deadmin_alias_password.description: The password of the deployment environment administrator.

celladmin_alias_user.description: The user name of the cell administrator.

celladmin_alias_password.description: The password of the cell administrator.

dmgr_hostname.description: The fully qualified domain name of the deployment manager to federate this node to.
dmgr_hostname.displayname: Business Automation Workflow Deployment Manager hostname

node_hostname.description: The fully qualified domain name of this node.

database_type.description: The database type for configuration, DB2 or Oracle.

db2_hostname.description: The fully qualified domain name of the DB2 database.
db2_hostname.displayname: Business Automation Workflow DB2 database hostname

db2_port.description: The port number of the DB2 database.

db_alias_user.description: The username of the DB2 database, which will be used to create the database user authentication alias.

db_alias_password.description: The password of the DB2 database, which will be used to create the database user authentication alias.

db2_bpmdb_name.description: The name of the Business Automation Workflow ProcessServerDb database.
db2_bpmdb_name.displayname: Business Automation Workflow ProcessServerDb database name

db2_pdwdb_name.description: The name of the Business Automation Workflow PerformanceDb database.
db2_pdwdb_name.displayname: Business Automation Workflow PerformanceDb database name

db2_cmndb_name.description: The name of the Business Automation Workflow CommonDB database.
db2_cmndb_name.displayname: Business Automation Workflow CommonDB database name

db2_cpedb_name.description: The name of Business Automation Workflow CPEDB database.
db2_cpedb_name.displayname: Business Automation Workflow CPEDB database name

schema.description: Specifies the schema for IBM Content Navigator (ICN)
schema.displayname: Content Database - IBM Content Navigator Schema

tsicn.description: Specifies the table space for IBM Content Navigator (ICN)
tsicn.displayname: Content Database - IBM Content Navigator Table Space

schema.description: Specifies the schema for the design object store (DOS)
schema.displayname: Content Database - Design Object Store Schema

tsdosdata.description: Specifies the data table space for the design object store (DOS)
tsdosdata.displayname: Content Database - Design Object Store Data Table Space

tsdoslob.description: Specifies large object table space for the design object store (DOS)
tsdoslob.displayname: Content Database - Design Object Store Large Object Table Space

tsdosidx.description: Specifies index table space for the design object store (DOS)
tsdosidx.displayname: Content Database - Design Object Store Index Table Space

schema.description: Specifies the schema for the target object store (TOS)
schema.displayname: Content Database - Target Object Store Schema

tstosdata.description: Specifies data table space for the target object store (TOS)
tstosdata.displayname: Content Database - Target Object Store Data Table Space

tstoslob.description: Specifies large object table space for the target object store (TOS)
tstoslob.displayname: Content Database - Target Object Store Large Object Table Space

tstosidx.description: Specifies index table space for the target object store (TOS)
tstosidx.displayname: Content Database - Target Object Store Index Table Space

hostname.description: The hostname of the Oracle database.

port.description: The port number of the Oracle database.

database_name.description: The name of the Oracle database.

jdbc_driver.description: The name of the Oracle JDBC Driver

username.description: The user name of the Shared database.

password.description: The user password of the Shared database.

username.description: The user name of the Cell database.

password.description: The user password of the Cell database.

username.description: The user name of the Process Server database.

password.description: The user password of the Process Server database.

username.description: The user name of the IBM Content Navigator (ICN) database.

password.description: The user password of the IBM Content Navigator (ICN) database.
password.displayname: IBM Content Navigator Database User Password

tsicn.description: The table space for IBM Content Navigator (ICN) database.

username.description: The user name of the Design Object Store (DOS) database.

password.description: The user password of the Design Object Store database.
password.displayname: Design Object Store Database User Password

tsdosdata.description: The data table space for the Design Object Store (DOS) database.
tsdosdata.displayname: Design Object Store Data Table Space

username.description: The user name of the Target Object Stare (TOS) database.

password.description: The user password of the Target Object Stare (TOS) database.
password.displayname: Target Object Store Database User Password

tstosdata.description: The data table space for the Target Object Stare (TOS) database.
tstosdata.displayname: Target Object Store Data Table Space

username.description: The user name of the Performance Data Warehouse database.

password.description: The user password of the Performance Data Warehouse database.
password.displayname: Performance Data Warehouse Database User Password

ps_environment_purpose.description: The purpose of this Workflow Server environment: Development, Test, Staging, or Production, which is necessary for the Workflow Server deployment environment.

ps_offline.description: The valid values are true or false. Set it to false if the Workflow Server is online and can be connected to the Workflow Center.

ps_pc_transport_protocol.description: The valid values are http or https. The transport protocol for communicating with the Workflow Center environment.

ps_pc_hostname.description: The host name of the Workflow Center environment.

ps_pc_port.description: The port number of the Process Center environment.

ps_pc_contextroot_prefix.description: The context root prefix of the Workflow Center environment. If set, the context root prefix must start with a forward slash character (/).
ps_pc_contextroot_prefix.displayname: Process Center environment context root prefix

ps_pc_alias_user.description: The user name of the Workflow Center authentication alias (which is used by online Workflow Server environments to connect to Workflow Center).
ps_pc_alias_user.displayname: Process Center authentication alias user name

ps_pc_alias_password.description: The password of the Workflow Center authentication alias (which is used by online Workflow Server environments to connect to Workflow Center).

offering_id.description: The product ID of the WebSphere Application Server offering.

install.description: A flag to determine whether to install DB2 as the embedded database system.

offering_id.description: The product ID of the Business Automation Workflow Embedded DB2 offering.
offering_id.displayname: Business Automation Workflow Embeded DB2 offering id

offering_version.description: The Business Automation Workflow embeded DB2 offering version value.
offering_version.displayname: Business Automation Workflow Embeded DB2 offering version

port.description: The port number of the DB2 database.

username.description: The username of the DB2 database.

password.description: The password of the DB2 database.

das_newuser.description: A flag to determine whether to create a new das user.

fenced_newuser.description: A flag to determine whether to create a new fenced user.

fenced_username.description: The fenced username of the DB2 database.

fenced_password.description: The fenced password of the DB2 database.

das_username.description: The das username of the DB2 database.

das_password.description: The das password of the DB2 database.
